mainEntity.name: Where can I read more about the impact of NFTs on the music industry?

acceptedAnswer.text: To learn more about NFTs and their impact on the music industry, you can read this article from Music Business Worldwide available at this [link](https://www.musicbusinessworldwide.com/how-musicians-are-getting-paid-more-through-nfts/).

mainEntity.name: How is blockchain technology reshaping the music industry?

acceptedAnswer.text: Blockchain technology is used to build transparency and efficiency in royalty distribution. More details can be found in this Forbes article available at this [link](https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbestechcouncil/2023/02/28/how-blockchain-is-reshaping-the-music-industry/).

mainEntity.name: What resources are available on NFTs' influence on creative industries?

acceptedAnswer.text: A documentary on the rise of NFTs offers insights into how they revolutionize various creative industries, including music. You can view it [here](https://www.vice.com/en/article/88nwed/how-nfts-are-transforming-the-art-world).

mainEntity.name: What are some platforms where musicians can mint and sell NFTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: Musicians can mint and sell their NFTs on platforms such as [OpenSea](https://opensea.io/) and [Zora](https://zora.co/), which empower creators with control over their digital works.

mainEntity.name: Are there eco-friendly blockchain platforms for NFTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, there are eco-friendly blockchain platforms that use Proof-of-Stake consensus to reduce the environmental impact of NFTs. Learn more about them in this [guide](https://www.coindesk.com/learn/2023/07/14/whats-the-deal-with-green-cryptocurrencies-a-guide-to-low-energy-blockchains/).
